mapper.select: select rn, noticeNum, noticeSub, noticeContents, noticeDate, noticeHits, noticeEmpId, noticeKind from (select ROWNUM rn, NOT_NUM noticeNum, NOT_SUB noticeSub, NOT_CONTENTS noticeContents, NOT_DATE noticeDate, NOT_HITS noticeHits, EMP_ID noticeEmpId, NOT_KIND noticeKind from (select * from notice order by NOT_DATE desc)) where rn between #{startEndPageDTO.startRow} and #{startEndPageDTO.endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (NOT_NUM, NOT_SUB, NOT_CONTENTS, NOT_DATE, NOT_HITS, EMP_ID, NOT_KIND) values ((),#{noticeSub},#{noticeContents},sysdate,0,#{noticeEmpId},#{noticeKind})
mapper.select: select NOT_NUM noticeNum, NOT_SUB noticeSub, NOT_CONTENTS noticeContents, NOT_DATE noticeDate, NOT_HITS noticeHits, EMP_ID noticeEmpId, NOT_KIND noticeKind from notice where NOT_NUM = #{noticeNum}
